title: Uncovering Rex
description: Secrets, Love, Intrigue, and Betrayals. Rex is the lead singer with the famous rock group Pogon. Baz is taking his first steps into the world of journalism. Forced together by greed and circumstance, they form a bond which should not be broken. Rex has been haunted by his past throughout his life, can he put that behind him and face the truth of who he really is? Baz must make some profound choices and face the demons that haunt him. Will truth win out? Will betrayals force them apart or make them stronger? Friendships will be tested and love will be lost and gained. Who will emerge triumphant in the end?  WARNING Written in British English. This book is the first in a series, which contains a male on male storyline. There are also graphic descriptions of sexual situations and strong language. 18+ advised.
author: Sammie J.
